title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 16, 2021
itunes:title: Beyond A Reasonable Doubt - December 16, 2021
description:
Gary and Mark link up and discuss some surprising developments in the New York appeals case of Harvey Weinstein. 

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
